48.ara-name: كتاب الدعوات عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“Allah is more delighted with the repentance of one of you, than one of you is, when finding his lost animal.”

chapter.eng-name: "Allah is More Delighted With The Repentance Of One Of You..."
